name: Simple Minds
overview: This game, written by a Simple Mind, is easy to understand. Every Simple Mind, including you, should understand the game easily. Your task is to complete 10 nice pictures of ten not so nice Simple Minds. On the upper left corner you will find an arrow. Put your cursor there and press fire for a new piece of the picture. You can move this piece by putting the cursor on it, pressing fire and pulling your joystick into the direction where you want to move the piece to. Simple isn't it? Complete the picture in the given time to go to the next level.
